column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////1) The tapas came out all at once. While I understand this is kind of the idea
column2: when you have 12 people ordering 8 different menu items
column5: the table gets a bit crowded if they all come out at once. Maybe bring a few out at a time
column6: especially as the latter parts of the evening saw the wait staff disappear. Not only did it make for a crowded table
column7: but contrary to what I've known about Spanish dining (or good dining in general
column8: is that it made the meal feel rushed
column9: like they were trying to get us out the door ASAP.
